title.rendered: DevOps Automation, GitOps, and Kubernetes: The State of Play 2021 v1.0

content.rendered:
Kubernetes is now mainstream, and GitOps practices are key to success. Those are the key findings of this important research conducted by Codefresh and GigaOM. The report not only details the scale of Kubernetes and GitOps adoption, it explores the motivating factors identified by survey respondents and reports the success experienced.

Read the full report to learn:

  • Year-over-year growth in Kubernetes deployment
  • The tools and methodologies seen as key to success
  • The most common bottlenecks found in deployment pipelines
  • The dramatic progress being made in automating deployment pipelines
